node.title: Evaluating the Final Impressions
node.description: OBJECTIVES 1. Understand the greatest impressions are the ones we make, not the ones we take. 2. Explore how 'Christ in You' is attainable for everyone. 3. Share through testimony the outcomes of 'Christ in You' impressions. 4. Demonstrate how practicing 'Christ in You' will improve relationships with patients and subsequently inspire lasting change.
